text: Porter Wayne Wagoner (August 12, 1927 â€“ October 28, 2007) was an American country music singer and songwriter. Wagoner made 53 studio albums. He had 80 singles, including three number one singles. Wagoner was part of Grand Ole Opry. He was nicknamed, Mr. Grand Ole Opry. Wagoner won three Grammy Awards. He was elected into the Country Music Hall of Fame in 2002. On October 28, 2007, Wagoner died of lung cancer in Nashville, Tennessee. == Other websites == * Porter Wagoner's Official website Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Musicians from Missouri Category:Singers from Missouri Category:American guitarists Category:Country musicians Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:1927 births Category:2007 deaths
title: Porter Wagoner
